message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14,000. It's a great deal, and I think you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I appreciate you coming down to $14,000.  I'm really interested, but I'm only able to go up to $13,000 at this time.  Let me know what you think.

Bob, I appreciate your interest and willingness to negotiate.  $13,000 is a bit low for me, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $13,500?  It's still a good deal for you, and it allows me to get closer to my desired price.  Let me know what you think.
